Package io.github.zero88.schedulerx.trigger

Class PreviewParameter

java.lang.Object
io.github.zero88.schedulerx.trigger.PreviewParameter
public final class PreviewParameter extends Object
The preview parameter to generate the next trigger time of the specific trigger.
Since:
2.0.0
